poem:
**Minimum**

so much depends  
upon  

a paper umbrella  
of nations  

glazed with "sovereignty"  
beside the clean  

white ledger  
and the black ink  

of profits  
shifted  

to Bermuda  
to the Caymans—  

where no hands  
make anything.
